021877214995244190654.description:
We are seeking a skilled Automation Engineer to help develop a solution for automating data entry and form autofill workflows for custom use cases. The project involves creating scripts to input user-provided data into various online forms, ensuring accuracy, efficiency, and seamless operation.  
  
Project Scope  
The project will focus on creating a robust and flexible automation tool for streamlining data entry tasks. The tool will:  
  
Retrieve structured data (e.g., user information, text inputs, file uploads) from a database or API.  
Autofill and submit the data into specific online forms or systems.  
Implement techniques to ensure compatibility and reliability across multiple platforms.  
Key Deliverables  
Custom Form Autofill Tool:  
  
Create scripts to autofill and submit data into online forms, tailored for each platform.  
Handle dynamic fields, dropdown menus, file uploads, and multi-step forms.  
Error Handling and Reporting:  
  
Implement error detection to identify issues like failed submissions or incorrect data formats.  
Provide detailed logs to monitor script performance and identify errors.  
Scalable Architecture:  
  
Design a solution that can handle varying volumes of data entry tasks efficiently.  
Ensure compatibility with different platforms and form structures.  
Performance Optimization:  
  
Minimize input errors and submission failures.  
Optimize execution speed while maintaining data accuracy.  
Requirements  
Technical Skills:  
  
Proficiency in Python or other relevant programming languages.  
Experience with web automation frameworks like Selenium.  
Ability to work with APIs, databases, and data manipulation tools.  
Experience:  
  
Proven track record of developing automation tools for data entry or form submissions.  
Knowledge of handling multi-step forms and dynamic fields.  
Problem-Solving:  
  
Ability to troubleshoot and resolve issues with compatibility, form structures, or data mismatches.  
Experience optimizing workflows for efficiency and reliability.  
Additional Information  
Data Source: The data to be entered will be provided via API or other structured formats.  
Target Platforms: A list of platforms will be provided, and scripts must be tailored to handle their unique requirements.  
Error Logs: Detailed reporting is essential to monitor performance and troubleshoot issues effectively.  
This project is ideal for automation engineers who enjoy creating efficient, reliable tools that simplify repetitive workflows. If you’re interested, please share your experience, examples of similar work, and your proposed approach to building these automation scripts.
021877214995244190654.title: Automation Engineer for Custom Data Entry and Form Autofill Tools

021877186881994689470.description:
VIRTUAL ASSISTANT NEEDED WITH SPECIALIST SKILLS IN LEAD GENERATION! SHORT TERM PROJECT WITH POTENTIAL FOR LONG TERM WORK OR FULL TIME ROLE FOR THE RIGHT CANDIDATE  
  
We're on the look out for a virtual assistant to assist in lead generation activities for our company  
  
We are a doors, timber & hardware supply & installation company, working within the residential new home construction industry in Sydney Australia.  
  
We are looking to reach out to new potential clients that fit our ideal avatar profile, which is project home & residential home builders across Sydney.  
  
We are looking for somebody who can provide us with a more detailed version of a data scrape on builders that fit our avatar, so that we have some good in depth knowledge on the company, the key points of contact within the company & some info about previous projects that we may be able to use during our outreaches.  
  
Your duties would include:  
  
\- compiling a list of contacts via google search, linkedin, instagram & any other sources that you may find of clients that suit our avatar  
\- research the companies to find contact details, office locations, key points of contact details/emails/phone numbers & find information on previous projects they may have completed  
\- create profiles in our client database (we use Asana to keep this information) & update them to suit  
\- Assist in nurturing these leads as we reach out to them & keeping them up to date in our CRM  
  
Ideally, you would have a good knowledge & experience in:  
  
\- Company/profile research  
\- Use of Asana software for task management  
\- Data management  
\- Communication tools such as WhatsApp  
  
Please note that we would require that you have a good level of reading, writing & communication in English for this role.  
  
We have a permanent role available for the right candidate for future administration tasks within the company also!  
  
Please reach out &  I would love to connect, thanks!

021877157270493531541.description: We are looking for a skilled Project Consultant to assist in defining, analysing, and documenting the requirements for our online education platform, which is currently in the development phase. This role combines aspects of project management, business analysis, and technical writing to ensure the successful delivery of a comprehensive requirements document for our development team.  Key Responsibilities:  1) Collaborate with the project owner to gather and understand project goals, user needs, and technical requirements.  2) Facilitate a detailed discovery session via video call to outline functional and non-functional requirements.  3)Document clear and structured Software Requirements Specifications (SRS) and related project documents.  4) Act as a liaison between stakeholders and the development team to ensure clarity and alignment of project objectives.  5) Provide input on project management and help define timelines, milestones, and deliverables.  6) Revise and finalize the requirements documentation based on feedback and additional insights.  Qualifications:  Experience in business analysis, project management, and/or technical writing.  Proven ability to gather and document functional and non-functional requirements.  Familiarity with online education platforms or similar systems is a plus.  Strong communication, organizational, and stakeholder management skills.  Knowledge of industry standards for requirements documentation and project workflows.  How to Apply:  If you have experience in project management, business analysis, and requirements writing, please apply with examples of your previous work and your availability for a video call.  We look forward to working with a professional who can help us shape the future of our platform!

021877067559804466819.description: Discord Bot for Monitoring Pokémon Card Restocks 1. Project Objective I am looking for a developer to create a Discord bot that monitors a specific website for Pokémon card restocks. When the bot detects that items are back in stock, it should send a notification to a designated Discord channel. 2. Bot Features Website Monitoring: URL: [Insert the website URL]. Monitor specific elements on the website indicating stock availability (e.g., "In Stock," "Out of Stock"). Discord Notifications: The notification should include: Product name. Price (if available). A link to the product. Notifications should be sent to a specific channel (provide the channel ID or name). Regular Monitoring: The bot should check the website every [e.g., 60 seconds]. Proxy Support (if needed): If the website blocks automated requests, the bot should support proxy usage or similar solutions. 3. Requirements Programming language: Preferably Python (but other options are acceptable). Documentation: Provide basic setup and usage instructions for the bot. Flexibility: The bot should allow future additions of more websites to monitor. 4. Additional Information Deadline: [Specify your desired timeline, e.g., 1-2 weeks]. Budget: [Specify your budget range, e.g., €100–300 for a basic bot]. Communication: English communication is fine for the project. 5. How to Apply Please include the following in your application: Examples of similar projects you have worked on (if available). Your proposed price and estimated time for completion.

021877049459176574356.description: We are seeking experienced developers to create automated web scraping agents capable of collecting, organizing, and delivering real-time data from multiple online platforms. These agents should handle dynamic content, integrate with APIs where available, and operate on a set schedule with minimal manual oversight.  The objective is to develop a robust system that scrapes various websites for specific data fields, ensuring that the extracted data is accurate and well- structured. The solution should include features such as error handling, logging, proxy management, and potential CAPTCHA bypass to maintain smooth operation.  Requirements: 1. Platforms to Scrape: • Reddit (targeted subreddits) • Yahoo Finance forums • Public online forums and discussion sites (specific ones to be discussed upon hiring) 2. Data to Extract: • Post titles • Comments and replies • User interactions (upvotes, replies, timestamps) • Relevant metadata from discussions 3. Automation Features: • Schedule-based execution (e.g., hourly or daily runs) • Error handling and automatic retries with logging • Proxy support and CAPTCHA bypass where needed 4. Output Requirements: • Export structured data in formats such as CSV or JSON • Clear documentation for running, maintaining, and updating the agents 5. Technical Skills Required: • Proficiency in web scraping using tools like Scrapy, BeautifulSoup, Selenium, or Puppeteer • Experience handling dynamic websites and anti-bot mechanisms • Familiarity with API-based data extraction where available • Strong Python skills or similar scripting languages • Solid understanding of data organization and export protocols  We’re looking for candidates who can deliver efficient, well-documented solutions with a strong focus on reliability and accuracy. Clear communication and timely progress updates are also important.  If you have worked on similar projects before, please include examples of your previous work, the tools you used, and any unique challenges you faced.
021877049459176574356.title: Web Scraping Agents Needed for Multi-Platform Data Extraction
